abstract: When Vikram S. Pandit took the reins of Citigroup last week, many wondered if he would begin a Morgan Stanley-ization of the firm. Mr. Pandit has already remade Citi’s capital markets group in Morgan Stanley’s image and acquired a private equity firm stocked with executives from his old firm.
